concept.title: 22.2108 Multiemployer plans or other funds, plans, or programs.

conbody.p: Contractors may fulfill their obligations under E.O. 13706 and 29 CFR Part 13 jointly with other contractors through a multi-employer plan, or may fulfill their obligations through an individual fund, plan, or program (see 29 CFR 13.8).
